articles.title: How to Create and Send WhatsApp Avatars - Beebom
articles.description: WhatsApp now lets you create Avatars and share them as stickers in chats. Here's how to create and send WhatsApp Avatars on Android and iOS.
articles.content: WhatsApp chats, or conversations in general, become more fun when you bring emojis and stickers into the mix. WhatsApp already offers the ability to send stickers in chats on its messaging platform. … [+6978 chars]
